de.team33.libs.exceptional.v3

Class Insight<T extends Throwable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.team33.libs.exceptional.v3.Insight<T>

  • public class Insight<T extends Throwable>
extends Object
    A tool that supports the differentiated handling of exceptions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the associated subject.

    • Method Detail

      • into

        public static <T extends Throwable> Insight<T> into(T subject)
        Initiates a Insight of the given subject.

      • throwMapped

        public final <X extends Throwable> Insight<T> throwMapped(Function<? super T,X> mapping)
                                                   throws X extends Throwable

        Applies the given mapping to the associated subject and throws the result if is it NOT null. Otherwise this Insight will be returned.

        This method is used to re-specify an exception. For example, if an exception was caught as a very common type, e.g. an Exception. At the same time, a suitable mapping to the respective exception can be applied with this variant.

        Throws:
        X extends Throwable
        See Also:
        reThrowIf(Class)

      • reThrowIf

        public final <X extends Throwable> Insight<T> reThrowIf(Class<X> type)
                                                 throws X extends Throwable

        Re-throws the associated subject if it matches the given exception type. Otherwise this Insight will be returned.

        This method is used to re-specify an exception. For example, if an exception was caught as a very common type, e.g. an Exception.

        Throws:
        X extends Throwable
        See Also:
        throwMapped(Function)

      • throwMappedCause

        public final <X extends Throwable> Insight<T> throwMappedCause(Function<Throwable,X> mapping)
                                                        throws X extends Throwable

        Applies the given mapping to the cause of the associated subject and throws the result if is it NOT null. Otherwise this Insight will be returned.

        This method is used to bring the cause of an exception back to the foreground. For example, if an exception was previously caught and encapsulated in another exception for technical reasons, e.g. a RuntimeException. At the same time, a suitable mapping to the respective exception can be applied with this variant.

        Throws:
        X extends Throwable
        See Also:
        reThrowCauseIf(Class)

      • reThrowCauseIf

        public final <X extends Throwable> Insight<T> reThrowCauseIf(Class<X> type)
                                                      throws X extends Throwable

        Re-throws the cause of the associated subject if it matches the given exception type. Otherwise this Insight will be returned.

        This method is used to bring the cause of an exception back to the foreground. For example, if an exception was previously caught and encapsulated in another exception for technical reasons, e.g. a RuntimeException.

        Throws:
        X extends Throwable
        See Also:
        throwMappedCause(Function)

      • fallback

        public final T fallback()
        Returns the associated subject.
